blocks.content:
This blog began its existance as a group project for a class I took on Javascript, wanting to practice my React skills I took upon myself the entire task of writing the blog from scratch after finding the cms system (tina) that the other members use to fill in the content. 

 Since I wrote the source code, I have stripped out all of the other group memebers' work, thrown in Lorem Ipsum in its place and offer to anyone who wants it as a Gatsby Starter free of charge as my thank you to all the open source projects just like this one that have helped me learn all of these awesome things.
I happened to come across the topic and thought it sounded cool so I used it lacking other inspiration at that moment.
